interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: The Nue Co. - SKIN FILTER - Blemish-clearing Ingestible Supplement - smoothing + tone + brightening - Beta-carotene, Vitamin C + Zinc - Gluten-Free, Sugar-Free, Non-GMO, Non-Toxic, Cruelty-free Review Date: 2023/01/27 Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'The Nue Co', 'Material Feature': 'Glu, Non-Comedogenic', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '30 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.9 x 2.32 x 2.28 inches; 4.97 Ounces'} Review Text: These are easy to digest quality vitamins for your skin. I found these to be of very good quality and I didn’t have any problems with digesting and didn’t give me that after vitamin taste. After finishing the bottle, I felt that my skin does appear to be brighter.

The only thing is that it’s $45 per month/bottle, which is quite steep and you definitely need to use on an ongoing basis to maintain/continue to see results. Review Title: Easy to Digest, great quality Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
[Upgrade] FUGACAL Hair Straightener Brush, 30s Fast Heating, 3 Temp Settings, Anti-Scald Design and 30mins Auto-Off, Bring You Ultra Straight Hair with Natural Shiny Look in Minutes Fugacal {'Brand': 'Fugacal', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Hair Type': 'Thick', 'Product Dimensions': '12.2 x 1.8 x 1.7 inches; 1.79 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'FG-HS01', 'Manufacturer': 'Fugacal'} I am a habitual flat iron user and recently purchased a wet to dry heating tool/comb, but decided to take a chance on this straightening brush steamer: I must say: I am quite impressed with this apparatus. It took me a quick second to get in a groove of running it through my hair, but after a few times, it was pretty easy. The tension/pull is really good and I liked how it left my hair. My hair feels so smooth and I am pretty satisfied with how my hair turned out (after my first try)... Really happy with this item Kpdoit Wireless Pen Mini Machine Pen and Kit Digital LED Display 2200mAh Professional Supply for Artists Kpdoit {'Brand': 'Kpdoit', 'Style': 'German', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Waterproof', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '3.9 x 2.3 x 7.4 inches; 12.77 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Kpdoit110', 'Manufacturer': 'Kpdoit'} This product is great for beginners and for an affordable price! Great for beginners! 1oz. Tree-topped Mustache Wax Tacky Firm - from Green Beard Grmng Green Beard Grmng {'Product Benefits': 'Holds mustaches firm while staying tacky for mid-day touchups. DIRECTIONS - Warm up with a hair dryer or run warm water over closed container if needed to soften the wax, scrape desired amount off with fingernail, rub into palm until smooth, and apply evenly to mustache. Lock in place with heat if desired.Holds mustaches firm while staying tacky for mid-day touchups. DIRECTIONS - Warm up with a hair dryer or run warm water over closed container if needed to soften the wax, scrape desired amoun… See more', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Liquid Volume': '1 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Wax', 'Package Dimensions': '4.72 x 2.8 x 0.87 inches; 2.08 Ounces'} This product holds the mustache well and doesn’t have an overpowering scent. I recommend this product at such an affordable price! Holds the mustache well! L'ANGE HAIR Argan-Infused Round Brush | Lightweight & Ergonomic Design | 53MM Tourmaline Ceramic Barrel L'ANGE HAIR {'Brand': "L'ANGE HAIR", 'Shape': 'Round', 'Handle Material': 'Ceramic', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Package Dimensions': '12.32 x 4.76 x 3.58 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2456', 'UPC': '810108191339'} I found this round brush to be of high quality and easy to use. I sometimes suffer from pain in my wrists due to typing often and found that this brush didn’t bother my wrists at all. I have never used an Argan infused brush and I did feel a difference between this brush and one without Argan: I did see that my hair felt smoother and less frizzy. The price point is on the higher end, but I felt the quality was definitely worth it. Great round brush for blow drying hair Dry Weightless Hair Volume and Texture Spray | Dry Texture Spray for Hair | Texturizing Spray | Sulfate and Cruelty Free 244ml (7oz) Osensia {'Hair Type': 'All, Dry, Fine', 'Liquid Volume': '7 Fluid Ounces', 'Brand': 'Osensia', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '7.0 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '8.03 x 1.93 x 1.89 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'UPC': '850001832274'} I have been trying products that gives your hair the “textured” look. I have used regularly during the Summer months and I found that it did add volume to my hair. It also doubles as a dry shampoo., as it absorbs oils from your hair. Lastly, I felt that the aerosol sprayed out the product with a good amount of strength, which is a plus for me. Great Volume and Texturing Spray Hygieia + Encapsulated 2% Retinol Cream – Liposomal Anti-Wrinkle Cream for Face, Neck & Body – Fast & Deep Cellular Absorption – Day or Night Cream for Firming, Lifting & Repairing Aging Skin, 4oz Hygieia + {'Brand': 'Hygieia +', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Active Ingredients': 'Retinol', 'Unit Count': '4.0 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '3.03 x 2.87 x 2.32 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '607469295352', 'Manufacturer': 'Hygieia +'} As I age, I’ve been using more products with retinol. I do have tretinoin cream prescribed to me (but it does irritate my face some): So, when I saw this on my Vine feed (free products for honest reviews), I ordered right away. I’ve been using this cream a few nights a week for the last few months. I don’t use products with retinol during the day, due to sun exposure (although, this product states it can be used day and night). I did notice my sunspots to be diminishing after using. It is moisturizing, too. The price is steeper than what I normally would pay, but the results are worth it. Great find and I would definitely order once I’m out. Nice retinol cream Everyday Beauty Renewal Night Cream Nourishing Facial Moisturizer with Brown Algae Extract, Squalene, Hyaluronic Acid and Glycerin to Moisturize and Protect Skin, Reduce Signs of Aging, 1 oz. Jar Everyday Beauty {'Brand': 'Everyday Beauty', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Active Ingredients': 'algae extract,glycerin', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '2.56 x 2.56 x 2.05 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'UPC': '700463002398', 'Manufacturer': 'Cosmetic Solutions, LLC'} I've never used any product with Brown Algae and liked the results. This cream felt very moisturizing with all the standout ingredients (squalene and hydraulic acid). I didn't break out and felt that it will serve me best in the Winter (based on it's moisturizing properties).

Overall, very good moisturizer at a very good price point. After finishing the bottle, I felt that my skin does appear to be brighter.

The only thing is that it’s $45 per month/bottle, which is quite steep and you definitely need to use on an ongoing basis to maintain/continue to see results. Easy to Digest, great quality

actual_interaction.title: Easy to Digest, great quality
actual_interaction.text:
These are easy to digest quality vitamins for your skin. I found these to be of very good quality and I didn’t have any problems with digesting and didn’t give me that after vitamin taste. After finishing the bottle, I felt that my skin does appear to be brighter.

The only thing is that it’s $45 per month/bottle, which is quite steep and you definitely need to use on an ongoing basis to maintain/continue to see results.
